prompt: Create a playful product categories page with a light green background and a centered app bar displaying 'Categories' in bold purple text. Arrange 6 product categories in a 2-column grid with rounded square cards featuring a white background and a purple border. Each card should have a centered purple icon (shopping bag, headphones, laptop, shirt, book, home) and category names (Electronics, Audio, Computers, Fashion, Books, Home) in black below. Add a fun bounce animation on card tap and use whimsical typography for a lively, engaging design.
